# Request for Proposal (RFP): Multifunctional Thermal Vision Monoculars

### Announcement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of 9 multifunctional thermal vision monoculars capable of taking photos and recording videos.

### Tender Details

* **Contract Reference Number**: WS3780974306-Doc3780934587
* **ESR Portal Reference Number**: 15065858
* **Public Tender Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15065858?extsite=MTUwNjU4NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mzg=](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15065858?extsite=MTUwNjU4NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mzg=)
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3780974306
* **Publication Date**: January 6th, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 25th, 2023, at 14:00 Hours
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Work and Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Instructions to Bidders

As detailed in Annex A, bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and the bid submission by the closing date and time. Any bids received after this date and time will be declared non-responsive.

### Bid Submission Requirements

* Bidder must meet the requirements specified in this RFP.
* Bidder must have relevant technical expertise and experience in the supply and installation of multifunctional thermal vision monoculars.
* Bidder must demonstrate the ability to provide the specified equipment and services within the required timeframe.

### Contact Information

* Meetinerary: Melanie Parent
* Email: Melanie.Parent@WMTGC-PSSG. Cpc.ca (on behalf of PSPC)
